HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: My Little RimPony - Version 4.1.7 What's New? The Changeling xenotype has been added. * Acid Spray * High cold resistance * Pyrophobia * High libido * Fertile * Very ugly * Grey eyes * Bald * No beard * Insect voice * Facial ridges * Ink black skin * Robust digestion * Pollution stimulus * Great construction skill * Great crafting skill * Terrible mining skill * Terrible cooking skill * Terrible plants skill * Terrible animals skill * Terrible artistic skill * Terrible medicine skill * Terrible social skill * Terrible intellectual skill

Welcome to the Xenotypes Update! What's New? - New Building: Marble Pie's Rock Exchange - Plushies now have their own item slot - Biotech: Four new pony based xenotypes - Biotech: New xenotypes scenario
